Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

Interface HalResponseCache

  • @ConsumerType
public interface HalResponseCache
    An SPI interface for a cache implementation that can be given to HalResourceLoaderBuilder.withCustomCache(HalResponseCache) if you want to store HAL+JSON responses in a custom cache (e.g. in an external, persistent data store).

    Note that it's entirely up to the HalResponseCache implementation to decide for how long a HalResponse is stored in the cache. Whether the response will but the framework will actually be used is determined by the caching HalResourceLoader implementation of the core framework, based on the HalResponse.getMaxAge() value and the time when the response was retrieved (taken from HalResponse.getTimestamp()).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe<HalResponse> load​(String uri)
      Tries to retrieve a cached response for the given URI from the cache
      void store​(HalResponse response)
      Store a HAL response in the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe<HalResponse> load​(String uri)
        Tries to retrieve a cached response for the given URI from the cache
        Parameters:
        uri - the absolute URI of the resource
        Returns:
        a Maybe that emits a HalResponse when a cached version is available (and is empty otherwise)

      • store

        void store​(HalResponse response)
        Store a HAL response in the cache. It is essential that all fields from the HalResponse are stored, and retrieved later without modifications.
        Parameters:
        response - the HalResponse to store
